availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: M H Blackford (1st ky cavalry Regimetnal Quartermast)

body.p: Enrolled and mustered as Regimental Quartermaster at Murfreesboro, TN July 27, 1862.

bibl.p: Tarrant, Sergeant E., The Wild Riders of the First Kentucky Cavalry : a History of the Regiment, in the Great War of the Rebellion, 1861-1865 : Pathetic Scenes, Amusing Incidents, and Thrilling Episodes, a Regimental Roster, Prison Life, Adventures, and Escapes (New York: New York Public Library, 1894), 393; Matthew H Blackford, 1862; from "Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers Who Served in Organizations from the State of Kentucky," Fold3.com; citing military unit First Cavalry, A-Bo, NARA microfilm publication M397, roll 1, National Archives and Records Administration, Washington, D.C.
